definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
contrary/opposite/backwards/to go against/to oppose/to betray/to rebel

sentences.english: So it's going to be the case for any irreversible engine.
sentences.chinese: 这对所有不可逆热机都成立。

sentences.english: Or, if a matrix is not invertible, then you have infinitely many solutions.
sentences.chinese: 或者矩阵不可逆时，有无穷解。

sentences.english: The conformational change of the enzyme induced by organic solvents was a dynamic process and was reversible to some extent.
sentences.chinese: 这种构象变化是一动态过程，且具有一定的可逆性。

sentences.english: The irrevocable trend of the development of the Chinese characters is simplifying.
sentences.chinese: 简化是汉字发展不可逆转的走向。

sentences.english: So we have first, a reversible process.
sentences.chinese: 所以我们有，首先，一个可逆反应。

sentences.english: But he said erosion of the U.S. manufacturing base 'is irreversible.
sentences.chinese: 但他说，美国制造业基础的侵蚀是不可逆转的。

sentences.english: So it's the same as q reversible plus w reversible.
sentences.chinese: 它们是相等的，因此这也等于q可逆加w可逆。

sentences.english: So it's the same as q reversible plus w reversible.
sentences.chinese: 它们是相等的，因此这也等于q可逆加w可逆。

sentences.english: The reversible optical sensing membrane for the determination of benzyl amine is described.
sentences.chinese: 本文报道了一种测定苄胺的可逆光敏膜。

sentences.english: In this paper, thermodynamics of irreversible processes at negative absolute temperatures is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文讨论负绝对温度下的不可逆过程热力学。

sentences.english: In order to reduce the irreversible losses, it must be saturated steam at the throat of diffuser.
sentences.chinese: 为了减少不可逆损失，设计时应使其为干饱和蒸汽。

sentences.english: The administration of radiocontrast media often leads to a reversible form of acute renal failure.
sentences.chinese: 造影剂应用后常可引起可逆性的急性肾功能损害。

sentences.english: The lightening and thinning of wool product is an irreversible tendency in wool spinning industry of today.
sentences.chinese: 羊毛产品轻薄化是当今毛纺行业不可逆转的趋势。

sentences.english: So for an irreversible process, I wouldn't really be allowed to put a path there.
sentences.chinese: 不可逆过程，是无法画出路径曲线来的。

definition: slow and patient/chronic (disease)/slow to take effect (e.g. a slow poison)
